title.english: Doctor Elise: The Royal Lady with the Lamp

description:
Making up for her sins in a past life as the evil princess Elise, Aoi Takamoto dedicates her life to saving people as a doctor. But a fatal accident cuts her atonement short and suddenly she’s back to her previous life, 10 years before her death! Will her foresight and medical brilliance help her change her past ways and heal an ailing empire, or is fate doomed to repeat itself?

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: เอลิเซ่ แพทย์หญิงทะลุมิติ

tags.name: Reincarnation
tags.description: Features a character being born again after death, typically as another person or in another world.

tags.name: Medicine
tags.description: Centered around the activities of people working in the field of medicine.

tags.name: Female Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is female.

tags.name: Shoujo
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult females.

tags.name: Royal Affairs
tags.description: Features nobility, alliances, arranged marriage, succession disputes, religious orders and other elements of royal politics.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Arranged Marriage
tags.description: Features two characters made to marry each other, usually by their family.

tags.name: Work
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a certain occupation.

tags.name: Ojou-sama
tags.description: Features a wealthy, high-class, oftentimes stuck up and demanding female character.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Age Regression
tags.description: Prominently features a character who was returned to a younger state.

tags.name: Villainess
tags.description: Centers around or prominently features a villainous noble lady.

tags.name: Rescue
tags.description: Centers around operations that carry out urgent treatment of injuries, remove people from danger, or save lives. This includes series that are about search-and-rescue teams, trauma surgeons, firefighters, and more.

tags.name: Foreign
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a country outside the country of origin.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Tanned Skin
tags.description: Prominently features characters with tanned skin.

tags.name: Marriage
tags.description: Centers around marriage between two or more characters.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Anachronism
tags.description: Prominently features elements that are out of place in the historical period the work takes place in, particularly modern elements in a historical setting.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Male Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several male characters who are romantically interested in them.

node.description:
[Website](http://hitodama.info/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/hitodama1103/)

A Japanese singer, songwriter, radio personality and scriptwriter.

She has released 17 singles and 11 albums since her debut as a 13-year-old in 1994. Several of her songs have been used as anime theme songs. She is often mistaken for a voice actress because she is in the same field of activity as idol-esque voice actresses. When she is working as a screenwriter, she goes by the name Deko Akao, an alias made up from her senior [Satoru Akahori](https://anilist.co/staff/97460/)'s name.

Mother of a son and twin daughters.

[Website](http://www1.s-cat.ne.jp/manga-do-honpo/) | [Blog](https://manga-do.hatenablog.com/)

Originating as an Animator from [Tatsunoko Production](https://anilist.co/studio/103/Tatsunoko-Production). However, he soon left the company and moved to [Mushi Productions](https://anilist.co/studio/68/Mushi-Productions).

He became a freelancer in 1969, and started working as a director around this time. He wasn't active in the industry during the 2000s but eventually returned.
